data:
A React UI library built using low level headless
Renderleskit components &
Tailwind.

Renderlesskit uses tailwind to provide better styling at one place, so you'll
need to setup a tailwind project using thier
installation guide.

The Button component can be used to trigger various kinds of user events such as
such as submitting a form, opening a dialog, canceling an action, or performing
a delete operation.
data.imports#Imports:
import { Button, ButtonGroup, IconButton } from "@renderlesskit/react-tailwind";

Button: The button which has prefix/suffix icons support, variants & size.
ButtonGroup: Used to group related buttons together in a horizontal stack,
can also be set as attached
IconButton: Accessible button to show an icon
data.button-sizes#Button sizes: Button has 4 sizes sm md lg xl
data.button-variants#Button variants:
Button has 4 variants solid subtle outline ghost


You can add extra variants & sizes via the theme file. Checkout theming
guide.
data.button-prefix-suffix--icononly#Button pr:
You can pass iconOnly, prefix and suffix props to the button to append or
prepend any content inside of button.
